narrative.narrative: Cambodia Angkor air is the flag carrier of Cambodia, founded in 2009. It is owned 51% by the government and 49% by Vietnam Airlines. It has two bases, one at Phnom Penh and another at Siem Reap. It has 5 destinations in China,2 in Vietnam and aBangkok in Thailand and also flies to Sihanoukville in Cambodia. As of 2014 it has four A321's and three ATR-72's.
